/>
VIII.iv.3.C.2.b
.
Definition:  Tightly Held Corporation
A
tightly held corporation
(or closely held corporation) is usually a family corporation.  A corporation bearing the Veteran’s name is usually indicative of a tightly held corporation.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C - Individual Unemployability (IU) Rating and Decision Review
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C
